Blaine.Spring Lake Park High School: Spring Lake Park High School (SLPHS) is a public high school in Spring Lake Park, Minnesota and is the only high school serving Spring Lake Park Schools (MN ISD 16). The school enrolls 1,526 2 students drawn primarily from the Minneapolis suburb of Spring Lake Park as well as parts of the suburbs of Blaine and Fridley. The Spring Lake Park Panthers are part of the North Suburban Conference.
